This study look safety , tolerability , PK determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) TAK-931 . This multi-center trial conduct Japan . The overall study duration approximately 42 month total dose escalation cohort safety expansion cohort . Participants make multiple visit clinic final visit approximately 30-40 day last dose study drug follow-up assessment .
